abstract: Thousands of people lined up Friday to be among the first to see the Wizarding World attraction, Universal Orlando’s $265 million bet on a boy wizard.
snippet: Thousands of people lined up Friday to be among the first to see the Wizarding World attraction, Universal Orlando’s $265 million bet on a boy wizard.
lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla.  First Harry Potter helped rejuvenate book publishing. Then he powered a boom in family mega-movies. Can the boy wizard now use his global popularity to give a lift to central Florida’s $31 billion tourism business?

headline.main: Hoping Tourists Will Flock to Hogwarts (and Spend a Few Galleons)
headline.print_headline: Hoping Tourists Will Flock to Hogwarts (and Spend a Few Galleons)

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Catharine Skipp
